ruleContent.content:
<js>
path=baseUrl.replace("http://info.chnsmoker.com","")
var url=[
"http://01.chnsmoker.com"+path,
"http://02.chnsmoker.com"+path,
"http://03.chnsmoker.com"+path
];
var res=java.ajaxAll(url);
for(var i in res){
	var code=res[i].code();
	if(code!=404){
		result=res[i].body();
	}
}
</js>$.data@js:java.aesBase64DecodeToString(result,"duxkdicyskoUGkdiYk873kKtPjd3Fjks","AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding","2938476381926736")

<js>
var path=JSON.parse(java.ajax(baseUrl)).data[0].chapter_path;
var url=[
"http://01.chnsmoker.com"+path,
"http://02.chnsmoker.com"+path,
"http://03.chnsmoker.com"+path
];
var res=java.ajaxAll(url);
for(var i in res){
	var code=res[i].code();
	if(code!=404){
		result=res[i].body();
	}
}
</js>$.data
